name: Proper Pie Company
address: 2505 E Broad St Ste 100, Richmond, VA 23223
description: This charming bakery is known for its delectable sweet and savory pies, with a diverse menu featuring options like Steak & Cheese, Pork Chili Verde, and Banoffee

name: L'Opossum
description: L'Opossum offers a unique Southern-French-New American dining experience in an intimate and classy setting, with dishes like Curried Butternut & Ginger Bisque and Hollywood Bone Yard BQ Lamb Chop

name: The Hill Cafe
description: This New American eatery is celebrated for its vibrant and diverse menu that artfully blends classic flavors with contemporary twists, offering comfort foods in a cozy setting

name: The Black Sheep Restaurant
description: This trendy and intimate spot offers a wide range of tapas and small plates, perfect for sharing, with options like the Bacon Tower and Crispy Chicken Wings

name: Lola's Farmhouse Bistro
description: A charming dining destination with a warm, inviting atmosphere, focusing on flavorful, well-crafted dishes made from fresh ingredients, with patrons raving about favorites like the poached pear salad

name: The Daily Kitchen & Bar
address: 2934 W. Cary St, Richmond, VA 23221 (Carytown location)
description: This establishment strives to serve foods that are not only delicious but also health-conscious, environmentally friendly, and socially responsible, using organic, all-natural, local, and sustainable ingredients

name: The Pigeon Hole
address: (Not explicitly found, but located in Charlottesville, VA)
description: Designed to be a place to feel warm and at home, offering classic and comfortable food with a focus on building relationships with people

name: The Blue Plate Diner
address: (Multiple locations, one in Dothan, AL, and one in RI)
description: Offers outrageously good home-cooked meals at very affordable prices, with a spirited atmosphere and prompt service

name: Bistro Bohem
address: 600 Florida Avenue NW, Washington DC 20001 (This is a DC location, not Virginia)
description: Specializes in Modern European cuisine, specifically Czech food, with a modern bar atmosphere. *Note: This establishment has closed.*

name: Boheme Bistro
address: 1118 E. Atlantic Avenue, Delray Beach, Florida 33483 (This is a Florida location, not Virginia)
description: Offers an elegant selection of authentic Mediterranean Italian dishes and quality boutique wines in a charming dining room and outdoor courtyard
